body.description: Transcend's DrivePro 550 is a dual lens dash camera that provides both drivers and passengers with optimum protection. The front lens features a STARVIS image sensor and wide field of view for capturing crystal-clear Full HD 1080P videos at 60fps, while the 180° rotatable rear lens is equipped with an Exmor sensor and four Infrared LEDs, allowing sharp in-car video recordings at night and in low light conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Dual lens, double the safety With its dual lens, the DrivePro 550 provides both drivers and passengers with optimum protection. It comes bundled with a Transcend microSD memory card built of high-quality NAND flash and tested under harsh environmental conditions. Vision in the dark The DrivePro 550's front lens is equipped with a STARVIS sensor to capture high-resolution images in superb, rich color even in low light. Supporting 1080P Full HD recording at 60fps, the front lens offers smooth footage as well as crisp still images. Rear lens with Infrared LEDs The rear-lens camera uses an Exmor sensor that records in 1080P Full HD at 30fps. It has four infrared LEDs that will automatically turn on in dim light. This greatly improves recording quality inside the cabin, even in pitch-black darkness. Work safer behind the wheel The DrivePro 550 also safeguards those who work behind the wheel for a living. Suitable for commercial for-hire transportation, shared transport, and charter services, the DrivePro 550 protects occupational drivers and helps ensure standard operating procedures are followed by drivers working in the taxi, express delivery, truck, and bus industries.

Wi-Fi connectivity The DrivePro 550 features Wi-Fi connectivity that, through the exclusive DrivePro App, allows real-time footage playback and download. This means ease of access to video evidence for reporting incidents to law enforcement and insurance companies without the need to remove the device’s memory card. GPS/GLONASS receiver The DrivePro 550 has a built-in GPS/GLONASS receiver for geotagging videos and images. With the exclusive DrivePro Toolbox, users can view routes traveled on a map display during video playback, making it easy to establish when and where an event occurred. Built-in battery In the event of a power outage, the built-in Li-Polymer battery can temporarily supply power to the DrivePro dashcam until the files being recorded are safely stored, so to prevent losing crucial images due to file damage. Value-added software Transcend offers free software, DrivePro Toolbox. Featuring video sorting function, smooth video playback, videos editing, screenshot, and map view for models with built-in GPS/GLONASS receivers, it creates more convenient experience for DrivePro users! Transcend's DrivePro App is designed specifically for use with DrivePro dashcam models featuring Wi-Fi connectivity. It allows streaming and downloading of recorded files to mobile devices quickly and conveniently.

Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera Inside the package DrivePro 550microSD memory cardSuction Car mountCar lighter adapterQuick Start Guide Value-added Features Main Features Prevents accidents by issuing a warning when a vehicle veers out of a lane. Warns the driver when the vehicle is getting too close to the car ahead. Shows current speed and driver safety alerts, LDWS, FCWS, headlight reminder, and driver fatigue alert. Automatically activates when the DrivePro detects poor lighting conditions. Reminds the driver to rest after driving for a self-defined period of time. Prevents overwriting of the file being recorded at the time when G-sensor detects an impact. Lane Departure Warning System Forward Collision Warning System Head-up display Driver fatigue alert Emergency recording

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best I've tried.
reviews.reviewText: It has good image. Main camera can be set to 1080p60. Auxillary camera is only 1080p30. Videos are a bit dark, but exposure can be set. Main and aux camera videos are saved into their separate files. It came with a 64GB high endurance card, which I appreciate. It automatically turns on when powered, and it turns off a few seconds when the supply is cut. The recording, however stops when going through the settings or the WiFi connected app are reviewing its contents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The transcend is easy to set up and easy to use. A decent support staff as well. This is my second Transcend Dash cam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, good memory, but lacks some clarity - during night shots and a bit bulky.
reviews.reviewText: Notice: On a sidenote... Depending on where you reside and your local jurisdiction, the suction mount provided, may be an illegal method to mount this camera on the windshield. Check with your local ordinances, rules and regulations.In my opinion, this is built a bit on the bulky-side. It can draw unnecessary attention, indicating to others, you have a camera. This can be good and/or bad. Not a fan of big/large branding logos on the products itself.The camera itself, is built solid. Camera lens is clear for general purpose day use, but does lack in other aspect. Lens/camera, picture, contrast, color, exposure, settings, are adequate for its intended purpose. Transcend is a solid brand, well known with the PC industry. The memory card it comes with is a 64 Gb Endurance series. The power cable it came with, on the other hand, is the standard straight-plug and not the 90 degree plug, as it's shown in the manual.The camera is packed with features. Please study (with trial-and-error) the online user guide thoroughly to understand each function. The app is useful, but can be improved. Video recordings has time, date, GPS, estimated speedometer and other information. Transferring and obtaining files is somewhat intuitive and easy (either removing the card media and transferring them manually or transferring via the app. Transferring speed is fast. The unit is smart enough to store all previously set settings and powering options will trigger modes you set.The only downside I saw, was during night time use. (Front-facing camera is set to the highest setting - 1080p @60fps) Other vehicle license plates cannot be read unless the camera is within a distance of about ~5 to ~7 feet away (in other words, less than a vehicle's length). This might be due to exposures, but will have to continually test to find out. Daytime videos are somewhat better. Anything past this distance becomes a blur. This happens when headlights are both ON or OFF. When ON, the camera sees the plates as washed-out. When off, the camera has a tough time picking-up letters and number, even with surrounding ambient lighting, other vehicle headlights or other neighboring lighting from streetlights, building lights, etc... This wouldn't be useful in a, say, hit-and-run incident.Rear-facing camera is ok (both day & night use with infrared lighting); can give important details during an accident, but can be improved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t beat it.
reviews.reviewText: The beauty of this dashcam is that the interior camera moves left and right opposed to up and down which in the event of getting pulled over etc. it comes in handy. And the fact that it’s obvious that it’s a dashcam people see it! No issues what so ever. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Newer versions is very slow when downloading videos
reviews.reviewText: Newer versions is very slow when downloading videos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set-up, good features, good value
reviews.reviewText: This dash-cam is easy to use. Getting it set up is quick, with good documentation available on the Transcend website. You should download the user manual. This is my third dash-cam from Transcend. I like the picture quality, ease of use and features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 50/50 quality for my SPECIFIC unit.
reviews.reviewText: Great high quality camera and excellent app for quick downloading and review of footage! Unfortunately…the battery on this camera NEVER charges and can only be utilized while plugged in. As soon as the AC power is removed, off goes the camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent video quality
reviews.reviewText: This is the 4th Transcend 550 I have bought. I have them in each of my 3 vehicles and this one was a gift for my son. Everyone should have a dashcam and the dual lens is great.
Estoy muy contento con la cámara tiene muchas funciones y es muy fácil su manejo

reviews.reviewTitle: facile da configurare, usare e connettere
reviews.reviewText: E' un ottimo prodotto. facile da configurare, da installare e da usare. il collegamento wireless consente di vedere in tempo reale le acquisizioni della dash-cam, ma anche di visionare ed eventualmente salvare su dispositivi mobili i filmati salvati sulla memory card installata all'interno della dash cam. ottima risoluzione sia in condizioni di luce che di buio

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable product brand from the reliable brand
reviews.reviewText: Pretty much easy to use straight out of the box, plug it to the lighter port / charging port of the car with the connecting accessories provided and mount the camera on to front windshield using the sucktion mount and you are all set. Download the one pro app and connect using wifi and with live view option check that your camera is aligned properly.Packing and delivery was instact, no complaints, thank you!Overall the product has been used for close to 700 kms journey, please note it records 3 minutes clip every 3 minutes and overwrites the oldest the video. Hence if there is important recording make sure to download it before it gets deleted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy order process delivered on time and good value for money very happy with the purchase, invaluable when using your vehicle, rear and forward images covered perfectly.

reviews.reviewTitle: TRANSCEND COMO SIEMPRE RELACIÓN CALIDAD PRECIO LO MEJOR.
reviews.reviewText: Hace unos meses que me la compré y de momento todo perfecto. Es la segunda dash cam de Transcend que tengo, y espero que me dure como la anterior, por cierto la anterior funciona perfectamente. Suelen sacar varias actualizaciones del software de la cámara, para mejorar su funcionamiento. Una cosa a mejorar sería el agarre por ventosa que se coloca en la luna delantera del coche, en días de mucho sol y calor, suele despegarse con facilidad y otra cosa a mejorar sería pulir un poco más el software o firmware del dispositivo.
